A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing. Luke's story should have had a much better finale\, particularly for the fans that have invested 40 years of life into these brilliant characters.  Adam Driver was fantastic and has proper depth to his character and performance. Couldn't have cared less if Finn had flown into that ram. Captain Phasma - what a terrible character! Should have been developed more. I had to watch Rogue One again that day to bring balance back.
